testcase.name: Custom function Signatures
testcase.description: If a custom function is used in an XPath expression but does not have a custom function signature within the discoverable taxonomy set that is being processed then the error MUST be thrown.

variation.name: Custom function to compute result value
variation.description: The custom function in a value expression does not have a custom function signature within the DTS.

variation.name: Custom function to compute filter qnameexpression
variation.description: The custom function in a filter qnameExpression does not have a custom function signature within the DTS.

variation.name: Custom function to compute resulting decimals
variation.description: The custom function in a decimals expression does not have a custom function signature within the DTS.
